CustomField.description: Label to use for the 'submit' button in the survey response interface.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting allows you to specify the label for the 'submit' button in the survey response interface. The submit button serves as the final action for participants to submit their survey responses. By providing a clear and concise label, you can enhance user understanding and encourage them to complete the survey.
CustomField.label: Submit Button Label
